name: A Game About Weariness
description:
Welcome to an ancient dungeon where you are trapped! We know that it can sound bad to be trapped,  but that's because you have never been trapped in a dungeon like this! Here we have lots of memorable characters (5 or so) and intrincate video game references that will proof that you're a true connoisseur of the 8th art. Have fun finding A Way Out! ;)

Use arrow keys to move and to interact.
